thread.title: Liberi Nantes: the first football team in Italy made up of refugees
thread.title_full: Liberi Nantes: the first football team in Italy made up of refugees

title: Liberi Nantes: the first football team in Italy made up of refugees
text:
Sports News | 2 October 2015 10:40 CET Liberi Nantes: the first football team in Italy made up of refugees - www.ghanasoccernet.com Football 
All but one of the players for Italian Terza Categoria team Liberi Nantes are refugees and migrants who risked their lives crossing the Mediterranean from Libya to Lampedusa. 
Alberto Urbinati, a diehard Lazio fan angered by the continuing racism in Italian football and his country's position on the frontline of a growing refugee crisis, explains why he founded the club 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
